localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Spot is a geographic video sharing app that finds and shares undiscovered places across the globe. Recorded videos will automatically be pinned on the map without manually tagging them. Start sharing â€” your ordinary life can be someone elseâ€™s extraordinary.
nodes.title: Spot - Map-based video sharing app
nodes.author: Nattu

nodes.excerpt: Search and scan for travel destinations based on current restrictions and policies. As youâ€™re looking for where to travel this summer, international or domestic, Airheart will help you understand which locations are accessible and whatâ€™s required.
nodes.title: Airheart Explorer - Quickly understand where you can travel and whatâ€™s required

nodes.excerpt: Notion Travel Planner Template. Travelo helps you to turn your travel bucketlist into a bulletproof action plan and help you manage your adventures in one workspace.
nodes.title: Travelo - Plan your next trip with this Notion template
nodes.author: Deepak Yadav

nodes.excerpt: A fast and convenient search for tickets right on Telegram messenger. Get lightning notifications whenever the price changes.
nodes.title: AirTrack 2.0 - Get notified about the cheapest flights on Telegram
nodes.author: Niki Kravchuk

nodes.excerpt: Camperguru saves time looking for the best spots. We work with photographers and experienced campers to find the 'creme de la creme' of camping. We personally visit, photograph and review camper spots. We don't list all spots. Just the best ones. 46 for now.
nodes.title: Camperguru - Collecting the 5% best camping & vanlife spots

nodes.excerpt: Cheep is a native iOS app that helps you find and discover amazing, really cheap flight deals --- and mistake fares that save up to 90% on tickets to/from over 200 domestic and international destinations. Widgets, dark mode, watchOS companion app and more!
nodes.title: Cheep - Save up to 90% on flights to 200 places around the world
nodes.author: Jonathan Chum

nodes.excerpt: Travis is a travel social network built on user-generated travel stories + functionality to: â € - Create travel guides with integrated maps - Discover travel stories by a global community - Curate moodboards and maps for future trips - Collaborate with friends!
nodes.title: Travis - Pinterest for travel planning

nodes.excerpt: 6'4" so leg room a must? Traveling with kids and can't do without in-flight games? Stop booking flights, showing up, and hoping for the best (blind booking). Search and book flights by amenities and cabin features with the all new FareUpThere web experience.
nodes.title: FareUpThere - Stop blind booking, search flight amenities pre-purchase
nodes.author: Malcolm Woods

nodes.excerpt: Flexible-term apartments with gigabit internet and office setup.
nodes.title: Anyplace Select - Remote work-friendly accommodations
nodes.author: Satoru Steve Naito

nodes.excerpt: Something better than "like a local". No tours, no guides, no crowds, no spam, no COVID-19. A special travel app for sharing off the beaten, hardcore and mostly free places to visit with like-minded people.
nodes.title: FREEKIN' - Social network and marketplace for non-touristy places
nodes.author: Ekaterina Lysykh

nodes.excerpt: Travel smarter with your ideas & plans all in one placeâ€¦now on web & iOS! - Save places, webpages, emails...anything you need for your trip - Use the iOS share menu for ideas from Instagram and other apps - View your ideas on maps to optimize your plans
nodes.title: Portico 1.0 for iOS - Your ultimate travel organizer, now on iOS
nodes.author: Dharmesh Shah

nodes.excerpt: Simplify your travel with Travi. Explore your travel destinations and bookmark your favorite things to do from activities to food options. Let us know your travel preferences and we will create a personalized itinerary to follow along day-by-day.
nodes.title: Travi - Easy travel planning with personalized itinerary
nodes.author: Joseph Lupo

nodes.excerpt: Congrats, you got the Covid-19 vaccine. Now save the record for free with VaxYes. In 3 easy steps you can get a secure, digital vaccine record that you can use for Travel, Live Shows, and Employers. Get your free, secure, verified digital vaccine card.
nodes.title: VaxYes - Free, secure, verified, digital vaccine card
nodes.author: Mouyyad Abdulhadi

nodes.excerpt: The tool estimates the number of trees that you have to plant in your country to delay global warming (following the Paris Agreement) and reduce earth's temperature rise to 1.5 â„ƒ by 2030. Reducing number of CO2 emissions-related deaths by 700,000 till 2030
nodes.title: Save the Secret - How many trees do we have to plant to delay global warming
nodes.author: Ayush Narula

nodes.excerpt: YESIM is the most functional eSIM application in the world. Having only eSIM compatible device and YESIM App, you get an opportunity to connect mobile internet in 126+ countries in the world, without paying roaming fees or changing sim-cards.
nodes.title: Yesim - International eSIM application
nodes.author: Dmitri Verbovski

nodes.excerpt: Discover the perfect backdrops for your pictures. Save on the go, plan trips visually and explore beautiful locations around the world.
nodes.title: Backdrop - Discover beautiful locations around the world
nodes.author: Timi Ajiboye

nodes.excerpt: Remote Choice provides you with relevant information to help you make a decision on where to live and work from remotely. Covering location guides, visas and more.
nodes.title: Remote Choice - Discover where to live and work from remotely
nodes.author: Leandro

nodes.excerpt: Take a Walk lets you take virtual walks around the world, filtering by country, time of day and weather. Enjoy the sigths of cities all around the world, and relax with the sounds that they have to offer!
nodes.title: Take a Walk - Relax, in your favorite places on earth
nodes.author: Mars H

nodes.excerpt: enjoy flying drones with spotfindr ğŸ” find amazing spots all over the world ğŸš¦ get drone regulations for every spot â˜ï¸ live weather data for every spot ğŸ“ get drone regulations for your current location
nodes.title: spotfindr 2.0 - Discover thousands of amazing drone spots around the globe
nodes.author: Michael Hitzker

nodes.excerpt: Travel Safe helps you discover the safest travel destinations during COVID-19. Browse locations by vaccine rates, travel requirements, and local restrictions.
nodes.title: Travel Safe - Discover the safest places to travel during Covid19
nodes.author: Jack Dweck

nodes.excerpt: Organize and collaborate on trips with friends and family! Completely FREE, with per-plan privacy, real-time syncing, Google maps integration, apps on web and mobile, offline mode, and more! Say goodbye to your planning headaches and start planning with Plip
nodes.title: Plip Trip Planner - Organize and collaborate on trips with friends and family
nodes.author: Max Korbel

nodes.excerpt: Card Curator is an app to help young professionals maximize their earnings from everyday spending and travel for free. Get personalized recommendations to help you automatically earn 5-10% or more on all your spending.
nodes.title: Card Curator - Win credit card rewards, points, and miles game
nodes.author: daniel senyard

nodes.excerpt: We built this product to let you receive your packages at a nearby pickup point...no more worrying about package theft, missed deliveries, or planning your day around when the delivery man is coming. We have ~1,000 locations all around the country.
nodes.title: Bounce Package Acceptance - Ship your packages to a nearby shop
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: All-In-One property management and sales automation platform for independent hotels and vacation rentals. We also help our properties upsell unsold rooms and amenities in a completely automated way via guest messaging and direct sales on website.
nodes.title: Stayflexi - Modern operating system for hotels and vacation rentals
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Covering 249 countries, Canitravel.net helps international travelers navigate Coronavirus restrictions worldwide. Whether you're looking to repatriate, meet your loved one, or find safe travel destinations, you can plan your next trip with confidence.
nodes.title: Canitravel.net - Covid restrictions made simple â€“ A new way to travel
nodes.author: Fred Balzi

nodes.excerpt: Take a Walk is a tool made to keep you company while you work or study. You name the place, weather, and time of day, or just leave the magic up to us. It's up to you â¤ï¸
nodes.title: Take A Walk - Go anywhere in the world while you WFH, study or just relax.

nodes.excerpt: Relocate.me is a 75,000-user strong niche job board for tech roles with relocation. It comes with a wealth of information on all things job relocation to help you decide where to move for work.
nodes.title: Relocate 3.0 - Get your next tech job abroad
nodes.author: Denis Dinkevich

nodes.excerpt: The ultimate app for all foodies, art lovers, keen shoppers, and urban explorers - simply organise the places you need and love, in any city in the world!
nodes.title: Urbaniser - Your New City Organiser. Never Forget a Place!
nodes.author: Idan Gal-Shohet

nodes.excerpt: An affiliate program for nomads to make money through their travel content.
nodes.title: Anyplace Nomad Affiliate Program - Nomad affiliate program to monetize your travel content
nodes.author: Satoru Steve Naito

nodes.excerpt: Duffel makes travel selling easy, fast, and developer-friendly. Our API enables any travel business to start selling flights from a network of leading airlines in minutes, not months.
nodes.title: Duffel - The best API to sell flights online
nodes.author: Lindsay Amos

nodes.excerpt: It's easy: go on the map, tap on another user, and send them a request for a photo! Gallery uploads are not allowed, so any photo they send will be taken on the spot, which means extra fresh photos on delivery!
nodes.title: Looxie - Location-based photo requests
nodes.author: Antonis Tsagaris

nodes.excerpt: Choose a channel and let your mind wander with the continuous stream of videos we handpicked from the best YouTube creators. Relax with the natural images and sounds while you work, put on your TV or invite your friends to watch together.
nodes.title: Escapista - Curated videos to relax and explore the world from home.
nodes.author: Cristiano Dalbem

nodes.excerpt: 1 pass. 7 continents. 23 brands. Thousands of trips from luxury journeys to group tours to private adventures. One price. Zero risk. Lock in your travel dreams today with full peace of mind and flexibility. Cancel any time. Redeem by 2023. Save $600.
nodes.title: FlexiPass by Travelstride - Fully flexible travel credits for trips to every continent.
nodes.author: Gavin Delany

nodes.excerpt: A members-only club for COVID conscious trip planning and on demand recommendations, curated by our in-the-know community.
nodes.title: The Club by Allcall - COVID conscious trips & on-demand text recs.
nodes.author: Chris Messina
